name: Light Hunters: Battalion of Darkness
description:
Light Hunters: Battalion of Darkness is an online card game, form your battalion of 3 heroes of different classes:
- Tank
- Offensive
- Healer
- Spellcaster

And fight until decimate all heroes of your opponents!
Each hero has 5 skills that you can activate to reduce the health of enemy heroes.

You can play online against the world, start a party, join the lobby and play a game in less than 5 minutes!
